hibernate-mapping.query: select new sidto( si.AccruedInt ) from PFMORM00040 as si where si.AccountNo=:accountNo and si.Active = true

select new sidto( si.Id, si.AccountNo, si.AccountSignature, si.CloseDate, si.Status, si.Budget, si.LastInt, si.AccruedInt, si.Month1, si.Month2, si.Month3, si.Month4, si.Month5, si.Month6, si.Month7, si.Month8, si.Month9, si.Month10, si.Month11, si.Month12, si.SourceBranchCode, si.DATE_TIME, si.CurrencyCode, si.Active, si.TS, si.CreatedDate, si.CreatedUserId, si.UpdatedDate, si.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00040 as si where si.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode and si.Active = true

update PFMORM00040 si set si.AccruedInt=:accruedint, si.Month1=:si_month, si.Month2=:si_month, si.Month3=:si_month, si.Month4=:si_month, si.Month5=:si_month, si.Month6=:si_month, si.Month7=:si_month, si.Month8=:si_month, si.Month9=:si_month, si.Month10=:si_month, si.Month11=:si_month, si.Month12=:si_month, si.Budget=:budget, si.UpdatedUserId=:updatedUserId, si.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where si.SourceBranchCode=:SourceBranchCode and si.Active = true
update PFMORM00040 si set si.CloseDate = :closeDate, si.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId, si.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate where si.AccountNo = :accountNo and si.Active = true

select new sidto( si.Id, si.AccountNo, si.AccountSignature, si.CloseDate, si.Status, si.Budget, si.LastInt, si.AccruedInt, si.Month1, si.Month2, si.Month3, si.Month4, si.Month5, si.Month6, si.Month7, si.Month8, si.Month9, si.Month10, si.Month11, si.Month12, si.SourceBranchCode, si.DATE_TIME, si.CurrencyCode, si.Active, si.TS, si.CreatedDate, si.CreatedUserId, si.UpdatedDate, si.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00040 as si where (si.CloseDate = null or si.CloseDate = '') and si.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and si.CurrencyCode = :cur and si.Active = true

select new sidto( si.Id, si.AccountNo, si.AccountSignature, si.CloseDate, si.Status, si.Budget, si.LastInt, si.AccruedInt, si.Month1, si.Month2, si.Month3, si.Month4, si.Month5, si.Month6, si.Month7, si.Month8, si.Month9, si.Month10, si.Month11, si.Month12, si.SourceBranchCode, si.DATE_TIME, si.CurrencyCode, si.Active, si.TS, si.CreatedDate, si.CreatedUserId, si.UpdatedDate, si.UpdatedUserId ) from PFMORM00040 as si where (si.CloseDate = null or si.CloseDate = '') and si.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr and si.CurrencyCode = :cur and si.Active = true and si.Budget = :Budget
update PFMORM00040 si set si.AccruedInt = si.AccruedInt + :accruedInt, si.UpdatedDate =: updateDate, si.UpdatedUserId =: updatedUserId where si.AccountNo =: accountNo and si.Active = true
select si.CurrencyCode from PFMORM00040 as si where (si.CloseDate = null or si.CloseDate = '') and si.Active = true and si.SourceBranchCode = :sourceBr group by si.CurrencyCode
update PFMORM00040 si set si.AccruedInt = 0, si.UpdatedDate =: updatedDate, si.UpdatedUserId =: updatedUserId where si.Active =true
update PFMORM00040 si set si.AccruedInt = 0, si.UpdatedDate =: updatedDate, si.UpdatedUserId =: updatedUserId where si.Active =true and si.AccountNo =: accountNo
update PFMORM00040 si set si.AccruedInt = :amount, si.UpdatedDate = :updatedDate, si.UpdatedUserId = :updatedUserId where si.Active =true and si.AccountNo = :accountNo
